CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( (RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Major Gift", TEXT( npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Corporate"),"14300", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Major Gift", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Individual"),"14000", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Grant", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Individual"),"14000", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) = "Grant", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Corporate"), "14300", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Major Gift", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Foundation"),"14100", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Grant", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Foundation"),"14100", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) = "Grant", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Government"), "14200", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Major Gift", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Government"),"14200", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Grant", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Other Institutional Giving"),"14220", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Major Gift", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Other Institutional Giving"),"14220", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Grant", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Government Contract"),"14300", IF( AND((RecordType.DeveloperName) ="Major Gift", TEXT(npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Government Contract"),"14300", null))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Pledge Inst Receivable Natural Account
